attributes.action: youth football / grass roots football should continue through lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
while the youths still go to school they should be allowed to play in youth team football, they are running around a field.
the last lockdown had a massive effect on the mental and physical health of the youth generation
attributes.background: to allow youth football to continue while they are at school together they should be allowed to play football, its good for physical and mental health

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169
